netFilter.title: Internet safety
netFilter.description: Configure secure Internet access for your home network to protect all devices and users from cyber threats.
netFilter.hint: Assign protection policies to devices in the home and guest segments. To add a device to the list, register it in the {{devicelistLinkOpen}}Device list{{devicelistLinkClose}} section

skydns.no-account: If you do not yet have a SkyDNS account, click 'Create account' to register for free and select the categories of sites you want to block.
skydns.has-account: I already have a SkyDNS account
skydns.sign-up-or-sign-in: To set up SkyDNS, create an account or login to an existing one using your username and password
skydns.title: SkyDNS
skydns.popup-description: Enter your email address and password you used to register on {{serviceLinkOpen}}SkyDNS website{{serviceLinkClose}}

safedns.no-account: If you do not yet have a SafeDNS account, click 'Create account' to register for free and select the categories of sites you want to block.
safedns.has-account: I already have a SafeDNS account
safedns.sign-up-or-sign-in: To set up SafeDNS, create an account or login to an existing one using your username and password
safedns.title: SafeDNS
safedns.popup-description: Enter your email address and password you used to register on {{serviceLinkOpen}}SafeDNS website{{serviceLinkClose}}

sky.sign-up-or-sign-in: To set up SkyDNS, create an account or login to an existing one using your username and password
sky.title: SkyDNS
sky.popup-description: Enter your email address and password you used to register on {{skydnsLinkOpen}}SkyDNS website{{skydnsLinkClose}}

netFilter.connection-unavailable: Unable to connect to {{service}} service. This type of service may be restricted by your ISP.
netFilter.profiles-header: Assignment of protection policies to devices
netFilter.no-registered-devices: To assign protection policies to individual devices, first {{devicelistLinkOpen}}register them{{devicelistLinkClose}}

static-dns.description: Specify custom DNS-servers that will be used by home network devices which don't have any policies applied.
